episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4001_1: Please don’t tell me this is your best.

Do I need to teach you the basics of
Fairy types again?

Heh! Whatever. Keep on talking from your
high horse. It won’t last long!
I’ll send you home crying in no time!
Then show me you’re not all talk.

And since when have YOU been in a
position to teach others, hm?
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/6801_1:
I’m representin’ Spikemuth Gym, so I’ve gotta
do well in the tournament!

I’ve got everyone’s cheers backing me...and
this uniform, too!
Well well, aren’t you all fired up.
I suppose I can’t fault that.
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4002_1: Bede...

You’ve gotten a bit too big for your boots
while I’ve been away, child.
You may be my successor as Gym Leader...
but last I saw you, you still had lots to learn.

You don’t have to lecture me the moment
you arrive...

What did you say? These old ears didn’t hear
a grumble, did they?
Er...no, I didn’t say anything...
Hahaha! Look at you!

It’s rare to see YOU all flustered!
Serves you right!

Laugh if you must, but I’d be careful if I
were you.
Huh? What’s that supposed to mean?
Never mind.
I believe some introductions are in order.

This here is Ms. Opal—a long-standing
Gym Leader from Galar.
She’s been training me as her successor.

Of course with my talents, I’ll be taking over
in no time.
Never one to stop bragging, are you, child.

Ohhh... So this is the old lady he told
me about.

Ms. Opal, this boy here is from the Paldea
region, and his name is—
Ortega, I presume? I saw your battle earlier.

So sincere and straightforward and yet so
twisted and misguided... Yes, you’ve got
potential, child.

Now that’s what I would call pink!
Congratulations!
Wh-what are you even talking about?!

Wouldn’t you like to be a better
Fairy-type user?

I’d be happy to take you under my wing and
train you alongside Bede.
Bede?

Hmph! Fine! I’ll prove I’m WAY better
than HIM!
Right, then.
*sigh* You fell right for it...

It’s like watching myself from not so
long ago...
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4003_1:
Here’s the deal... A survey was taken on
Pasio to see how popular different towns
and celebrities are.
And we’re here to announce the results!
Oh. We’re down near the bottom.

Piers the Melancholy is a well-known
singer...

But I guess people aren’t tuned in to where
I’m from, huh.
All I can do as a singer is sing my songs...
Well, that ranking may be a shock...

but we did learn somethin’ useful—we can’t
just rely on Big Bro to carry our name!

Let’s get all of Team Yell together and figure
out what we can do!
Let’s all give ’er a proper cheer!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4004_1: And so...

We’re trying to think up ways to show off
Spikemuth’s charm.
Any ideas, Chairman Rose?
Let me see...

What if we held a tournament featuring
celebrity Trainers from each region?
So...like a battle of the regions?
Precisely!

Gathering well-known Trainers from all over
should attract a diverse audience!

Perhaps we could describe each contestant’s
hometown, too.
That sounds great!

Yeah! It’ll be a chance to share what makes
every town and Gym Leader special!
Thanks, Leon! You too, Mr. Rose!
OK, time to get started.
Hang on, Sis.
What?

In this tournament, I want to show off all the
new charm you’ve brought to Spikemuth.

So I’d rather you represent Spikemuth Gym
than me.
Me? Really?
OK! I’ll do it!
I’ll do everything I can to help!

I’m gonna train proper hard for this
tournament!

I suppose this is how the next generation
will help forge the future.

Yeah! Everyone’s gonna get stronger
together and keep building on our history.
That’s the Galar we all love!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4005_1:
I talked to Gloria and the others, but you’ll
join too...right, Bede?

A tournament for celebrities to become
better known?
I’ll cover everything in the color of Bede!
I GUESS I could represent Paldea.
Oh, um... The participants for Paldea are already full.

Bede, I’ll leave this tournament to you.
Good luck handling it on your own.

That was the plan... But where are
you going?

I’ve something to discuss with Rose,
the young chap.

I’m joinin’ this tournament to put Spikemuth
on the map.
Are you gonna battle for Ballonlea Gym?
No. I’m doing this for myself.

Yeah, I wouldn’t expect a guy like you to
do his best for anyone but himself!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4006_1:
Well, if it isn’t Ms. Opal! I’m pleased to see
you in good health!

Likewise. I didn’t think I’d get to see
you again.
Never mind. I’m not here to discuss that.

In the upcoming battles, don’t take your eye
off my young Bede.

He’ll show you that future you’re always
yapping about.
Indeed. I have high hopes for him.

I expect much more from him than just the
strength to carry the future!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4007_1: I’m back. You haven’t been slacking, I hope.

You have nothing to worry about. We were
training properly.

You say that, but it doesn’t look like you’ve
made much progress.

That may be true... But rest assured, I WILL
show you results.

Hey! What’s the deal?! You didn’t have to be
THAT mean!

Be as mean as you like to me, but at least
give Bede a few words of encouragement!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4008_1:
I’m ready for tomorrow’s matches—
all thanks to you!
It’s the least I could do.
But why call me to train all of a sudden?

I wanted to study your tactics as much as
possible.

Marnie... Back in Galar, I stepped down
as Spikemuth’s Gym Leader so you could
take over.
But I never wanted you to replace me.

I want you to represent Spikemuth Gym in
your own way.

Even if you make mistakes, no one will
blame you.

In fact, recovering from mistakes is where
we Spikemuth Trainers shine.

If we hit rock bottom, we’ll all find our way
back up together.

I’d never do anything to hurt OUR
hometown’s hype!

Let’s shout Spikemuth’s name and show the
world how great it is!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4009_1: On the day of the tournament...

For today’s tournament, we’ve gathered
talented celebrities from every region!

I’m sure many of their hardcore fans are in
the crowd!

Some of you may discover new sync pairs to
cheer on!

Let’s make some noise for your favorite
sync pairs!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4010_1:
The mysterious masked wrestler from Alola,
the Masked Royal, is attacking boldly!

Opposing him is Clair, the dragon master
from Johto’s Blackthorn City, who elegantly
countered his attack!

Brycen, the famous actor from Unova,
has launched a barrage of attacks against
Hoenn’s contest idol, Lisia!

Who will steal the audience’s heart in this
Pokémon battle?!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4011_1: And now, it’s time for the next match!
Here comes Marnie, from Galar’s Spikemuth!

She’s the talented younger sister of the
famous singer Piers! She’s also garnered
lots of secret fans!

Will these siblings claim victory for
Spikemuth, their hometown?!

In the other corner is the Supercharged
Streamer!

It’s Iono, the Gym Leader of Levincia,
from the Paldea region!

She’s a popular influencer with view counts
on the rise like an Eelektross crawling out of
the ocean—even here on Pasio!

Bzzzt! It’s givin’ all sortsa “Let’s do this!”
vibes!
Thanks! All of Team Yell’s hearts are in it!
With it on, I’ve GOT to win!

Aw yeah! I’m always down for a battle that
brings the drama!

Plus, I’m live streaming as we speak! All my
loyal viewers’ eyeballs are on us!

Promote away! Show ’em what Spikemuth’s
all about!
You bet I will! That was the plan all along!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4012_1:
Oh noes! This isn’t good! Loyal fans—I need
to hear you cheerin’! Gimme all you got!

Let’s go for the win, Grimmsnarl!
Gigantamax!
That outfit suits you quite nicely!
Is it true it’s a Fairy-type Gym’s uniform?

I was told, ad nauseum, that today I should
wear an outfit befitting Ballonlea Gym.
*chuckle* I imagine Opal told you that.
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4013_1: I heard what happened to Bede.

When he was all alone, you saved him,
right?

That means you’re pretty much family!
Shouldn’t you be a little nicer to him?!
Your parents must’ve spoiled you rotten.

No matter what anyone says, I don’t plan to
change how I educate Bede.

I need the child to stand on his own two feet
as soon as possible.
But why push him so hard?
That child doesn’t need a guardian.

What the lad needs are companions—rivals
who’ll walk beside him, toward the same
future!
In fact, he’s already found just that.
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4014_1: Marnie! Bede! Good luck—both of you!

You two are the only ones from Galar
who’re still in the tournament!
You can do it! There’s always a way to win!

Companions and rivals who’ll walk beside
him, toward the same future...

The spectators are getting restless.
Perhaps I should end this.

We’ll show you a truly great pink. It’s time
for my dear Rapidash to Dynamax!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4015_1: Wow, look at them go! What a match!
Would you like to join them, Leon?

Is it not a Champion’s duty to hype up the
crowd at tournaments?

Oh, what’s this?! A new challenger joins
the fray!
episode_event_ch0245_80_ch0246_80/4016_1:
Check it out! Spikemuth’s trending on social
media!
That’s great, Marnie!
Hey, all!

You’ve been battling in the tournament,
so you must be hungry.

I prepared some food. I SUPPOSE I could
extend an invitation, if you like.
Well, well. How considerate of you.
Oh, shut it! Are you coming or not?!
We’d love to!
Then it’s decided! Let’s go!
Hurry up—before the food gets cold!
Ah, excuse me.

I have something to take care of.
You go on ahead.
OK! See you later!
I’m sure you saw my battles, Ms. Opal.

You’ve seen what it looks like for a
Fairy-type user to surpass you.
You can rest easy now. And retire.

Sheesh. That tongue of yours keeps getting
more and more twisted.
But of course.

I’m sincere and straightforward...yet twisted
and misguided. Just like my teacher.
Cheeky as ever, that successor of mine.
